name: Ultimate Giving 5 Championship DX
description:
This game was made during the Yogscast Game Jam.

A fun game that tests your memory!

Welcome to the... Ultimate Giving 5 Championship DX!

The only championship that tests your fancy handshake skills!

This memory, rhythm game, tests the player by making them repeat an ever-growing sequence of signs while at the same time following the music beat.

Created by:

John Kyritsis - Sound Designer, Composer and Artist

Lydia Papaconstantinou - Animator and Artist

Dimitris Ladias - Programmer and heavy sleeper
